Transformation Techs
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Monster Types: Beaclon/Worm: Transformation Techs
By Animatrix4 on Sunday, May 12, 2002 - 12:43 pm:

When a worm cocoons into a different monster, the worm's techs change into the monster's appropriate techs. Does this mean that the uses of the techs transfer over as well?

By John Hawley on Sunday, May 12, 2002 - 03:44 pm:

We believe so, but I'm not sure anyone has done any research on it.
